walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Arkhe
walkthroughs.description: Ideate, visualize, and track your codebase structure.

steps.title: Welcome to Arkhe
steps.description: Arkhe is an AI-assisted tool for ideating, visualizing, and tracking codebase structure. It combines conversation and visualization to help you clarify ideas, explore architectural options, and translate intent into a concrete blueprint—whether you’re starting fresh or working from an existing codebase.

steps.title: Step 1: Connect your AI
steps.description: To enable AI-assisted generation, enter your API key and select your preferred model in the settings.

steps.title: Step 2: Choose or Describe Your Architecture
steps.description: Begin by selecting a suggested option or by chatting with Arkhe. Scroll and interact with previous diagrams to track how your thinking evolves.

media.altText: Arkhe prompt input with starter templates

steps.title: Step 3: Save & Align
steps.description: Save a diagram as your architectural reference. When you reopen Arkhe, compare your current codebase against the saved blueprint to identify drift and keep your implementation aligned with your intent.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run package-ext && npm run build:webview
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
